channel.title: Help with dialogues, PLEASE!
channel.description: Hey im new to coding and i want to add dialogues. i want it so u talk to a npc and it gives u option to tele to floor 1,2,3 of slayer tower? can some give me a tut or show me the code. Thanks :) ps. iv been trying hard for ages!

item.title: Help with dialogues, PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @reality0scape reality0scape
item.description:
@reality0scape wrote:

dialoguehandler.java:

add:

case 999: sendOption3("Floor 1", "Floor 2", "Floor 3"); c.dialogueAction = 9999; c.nextChat = 0; break;

Clickingbuttons:
Search:

Under it add:

if (c.dialogueAction == 999) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(XCOORD, YCOORD, HEIGHT); c.dialogueAction = -1; }
Change the coordinations!!!

Search:

Under it add:

if (c.dialogueAction == 999) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(XCOORD, YCOORD, HEIGHT); c.dialogueAction = -1; }
Change the coordinations!!!

Search:

Under it add:

if (c.dialogueAction == 999) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(XCOORD, YCOORD, HEIGHT); c.dialogueAction = -1; }
Change the coordinations!!!

Done easy
